subject: p14608347
Findings: The cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. The lungs demonstrate improved vascular congestion. In the retrocardiac region, there is a rounded density which is confirmed on the lateral view, compatible with a hiatal hernia. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
